nodes.text: The Malita Tal Environmentalism Award was an award given to commemorate efforts to restore natural ecosystems by 3630 BBY. It was created in the name of Malita Tal, a Zakuulan superstar known for her humanitarian and environmental work, which included the preservation of wildlife on the planet Zakuul.

The Malita Tal Environmentalism Award was mentioned in the 2015 Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion to the 2011 BioWare massively multiplayer online role-playing game, Star Wars: The Old Republic, in the Codex entry for Malita Tal.
